titles.title: To establish certain procedures regarding the appointment and tenure of persons to the International St. Lawrence River Board of Control established by the International Joint Commission under the Boundary Waters Treaty of 1909.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 11/16/1999--Introduced. Sets forth certain procedures regarding the term and appointment of persons to the U.S. section of the International St. Lawrence River Board of Control established by the International Joint Commission under the Order of Approval for Regulation of Lake Ontario. Makes such procedures applicable to other boards established by the Commission.
